Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: "The 700 Club," which first broadcast in 1966, is a newsmagazine featuring guests, news, music, testimonies and spiritual stories from a Christian perspective. News stories are frequently related to Bible passages or deal with Christian lifestyle issues. Hosts of the long-running religious show include televangelist (and former candidate for the Republican presidential nomination) Pat Robertson, Terry Meeuwsen and Gordon Robertson, son of Pat. News items of interest are delivered by anchor John Jessup.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering every topic under the sun; John Michael Higgins hosts.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: When a land-hungry rancher sends his bullies to harass peace-loving Mormons into giving up their fertile valley, a lazy gunfighter with a very quick draw and amazing accuracy, along with his horse-thieving brother, come to the settlers' rescue.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E26 Assault Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E27 Short Rope for a Tall Man Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E28 The Clarence Bibs Story Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Friend Zone A shipment from Faith Cattle Company is in jeopardy when the truck gets stuck in a ditch. It’s a race against the clock to get the cattle to the buyer or risk losing the deal. Bubba teams up with his father-in-law to build a custom grill prototype in hopes of launching a new business venture. Cody decides to sell a horse to help fund his dream home, but he receives an offer that is less than ideal. After getting relationship advice from Bubba and Cody, Booger ends up on a date with his best friend Ashley.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E5 Is It a Boy or a Girl? Before heading out for the day’s work, Bubba notices one of his colts is missing, and the guys go searching for the young horse before it is injured. At the urging of his grandmother, Booger ventures into the world of Internet dating, hoping to find a serious girlfriend. After Bubba’s trusted horse gets sick, he asks Booger to help him break in a new colt. Cody and Misty finally find out if they are having a little cowboy or cowgirl, and they plan a party to reveal the gender to friends and family.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: When a land-hungry rancher sends his bullies to harass peace-loving Mormons into giving up their fertile valley, a lazy gunfighter with a very quick draw and amazing accuracy, along with his horse-thieving brother, come to the settlers' rescue.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E26 Assault Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E27 Short Rope for a Tall Man Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E28 The Clarence Bibs Story Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E6 Misty Makes a Match The cowboys are in for a busy week when they’re called upon to capture a wild hog that has been getting into a neighbor’s garden. They also search a swamp for a calf that goes missing when they move their herd. Cody and Misty get serious about finding a name for their baby boy, so they study their family trees for inspiration. After a disastrous attempt at Internet dating, Booger takes one more shot at dating and agrees to go on a blind date that Misty arranges. Will he finally find a woman that understands the cowboy way of life?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E7 Frost Moves In Bubba and Cody rush to get their grass planted before the first frost, but they need a bigger tractor to get the job done. Bubba ends up building a horse stall for a neighbor in exchange for the use of his tractor. Booger’s relationship with Jaclyn gets serious, and he meets her son for the first time. Cody and Booger rescue a cow from a huge dirt pit, and Cody receives a load of dirt for the foundation of his dream home. Finally, Kaley surprises Bubba with the news that their baby girl is going to arrive sooner than expected.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E2 Grit, Guts and Danger The 13 remaining cowboys compete in individual and team challenges to prove their skills to host Trace Adkins and his expert judges, but the competition turns perilous when one cowboy disappears while herding horses in the unforgiving Arizona desert.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E4 Lewis & Clark: Captains of Discovery Under orders from President Jefferson to explore America's vast unknown frontier, Meriwether Lewis and William Clark lead an expedition up the Missouri River in an attempt to reach the Pacific Ocean...a journey no American has made before, and one that may not even be possible. Leaving Fort Mandan after their first winter on the frontier, the Corps of Discovery enters completely uncharted territory. But as the waterways they travel become too shallow for boats, Lewis and Clark desperately seek the Shoshone tribe and their horses. To communicate with the elusive tribe, they rely on Sacagawea, a 16-year-old Shoshone woman, who accompanies the expedition with her newborn son. Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E18 Daddy's Girl There is a new girl in Sweetwater, and she has eyes for Buck. However, Buck must contend with her rich, oppressive father. Meanwhile, the riders help a woman in need after the corrupt banker's henchmen kill her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E30 The Mescalero Curse Lucas serves as a jury foreman when a Mescalero Apache Indian is found guilty of murder and is hanged. A Mescalero medicine man places a curse on Lucas. At first Lucas brushes it off, then unusual events begin to happen including a ghost stallion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: Savannah Sunrise
programme.desc: Joy Miles thinks she's taking a simple road trip to move her mother-in-law, Loraine, from Louisville to Savannah. Complete opposites, the two women manage to tolerate each other - barely. Type A+ personality, Joy is consumed with a high-stakes project at work. She has her days scheduled to the second. Now widowed, free-spirited Loraine is moving to a retirement community, no longer a preacher's wife, but a woman on her own. Her insights about life and family get under Joy's skin, challenging Joy to take a hard look at her whirlwind career and her priorities. As the weekend unfolds, with its outrageous adventures, hilarious encounters and heart-to-heart revelations, the women come to see each other through new eyes, and both women make an astounding discovery: they need each other more than they know.

programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

Complete opposites, the two women manage to tolerate each other - barely. Type A+ personality, Joy is consumed with a high-stakes project at work. She has her days scheduled to the second. Now widowed, free-spirited Loraine is moving to a retirement community, no longer a preacher's wife, but a woman on her own. Her insights about life and family get under Joy's skin, challenging Joy to take a hard look at her whirlwind career and her priorities. As the weekend unfolds, with its outrageous adventures, hilarious encounters and heart-to-heart revelations, the women come to see each other through new eyes, and both women make an astounding discovery: they need each other more than they know.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E8 An Extra Hand Cody, Bubba, and Booger audition a bunch of local cowboys and non-cowboys to find a ranch hand that can help out when Bubba takes time off to be with his new baby. Bubba and Kaley risk one last trip to Mississippi for a baby shower. Kaley wants to see her family, but they worry that the baby will come early and be born outside of Alabama. After meeting with his banker, Booger is forced to sell off his family’s land, but he desperately hopes to find a buyer willing to let him keep a small portion with his grandmother’s house.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E9 New Beginnings Bubba and Kaley welcome their baby girl into the world. When they get home from the hospital, Kaley surprises Bubba with a special gift. Cody lands a big contracting job with a local rancher, but the work needs to be completed in a week. He needs this job to fund the construction of his dream home, so he must get the work done somehow. Booger is beginning to think that Jaclyn might be “the one,” so he decides to introduce her to his grandma. Finally, the whole gang gets together for a Faith Cattle family barbecue to meet baby Andie.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sabotage and Soul Searching Given a choice to help or sabotage their fellow contestants, the thirteen remaining cowboys are forced to question their values and the lengths they'll go to win a $50,000 herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges eliminate two cowboys.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E8 Jedediah Smith: Scholar and Survivor A young Jedediah Smith joins William Ashley's expedition and helps establish the fur trade along the Missouri River, but it's not hunting or trapping he longs for...it's adventure. Inspired by Lewis and Clark, he wants to explore the vast, uncharted American frontier. Trekking through unknown and unforgiving terrain, Smith's iron will and unwavering courage under fire help him survive a vicious grizzly bear attack, hostile Native Americans, and life-or-death periods of starvation, dehydration, and exhaustion. During his incredible journeys, he becomes the first non-Native American to cross the Mojave Desert into California, the first to navigate through the perilous Sierra Nevada Mountains, and the first to traverse the Great Basin Desert. He ultimately sees more of the American West than any other adventurer, including Lewis and Clark, and opens the frontier in a way that no other mountain man can claim.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E19 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Vaqueros Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 Blind Spot Cheyenne rides into a small cotton town to pick up a friend's son to try to reunite a family bitterly divided by the Civil War. He soon battles hatred and greed by a vigilante gang that is holding the town captive.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E1 Reprieve Sheriff Pinkerton deputizes Cheyenne, and he transports crook Wes McQueen to a hidden fortune. When someone shoots and kills McQueen, Cheyenne impersonates him in order to find the bounty.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E8 An Extra Hand Cody, Bubba, and Booger audition a bunch of local cowboys and non-cowboys to find a ranch hand that can help out when Bubba takes time off to be with his new baby. programme.desc: S3 E1 Reprieve Sheriff Pinkerton deputizes Cheyenne, and he transports crook Wes McQueen to a hidden fortune. When someone shoots and kills McQueen, Cheyenne impersonates him in order to find the bounty.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it’s an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody’s brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other’s workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba’s ranch chores. Misty wants to be a stay-at-home mom, but suffers an accident while trying to help Cody on the farm. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E4 Cowboy Up Cowboys need brawn and brains, so the remaining 11 contestants are tested on both. First, they guess the cost of common ranch items; then they endure a grueling overnight challenge guarding a herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins eliminates two cowboys.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Trapper, Trader, Legend Although from humble beginnings, Tom Fitzpatrick is ambitious and intelligent. When he joins up with William Ashley's trapping expedition, he proves himself to be an invaluable member of the company, both as a hardy frontiersman and a shrewd businessman. Along with legendary mountain man Jedediah Smith, Fitzpatrick rediscovers the South Pass through the Rocky Mountains, opening the pathway that will enable western expansion for decades to come. Fitzpatrick quickly rises to the top of the fur trade and eventually takes over the company he once worked for, but he nearly loses everything when he takes a wrong turn while leading a supply train. Alone in the wilderness, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a band of Gros Ventre warriors. Somehow, Fitzpatrick must survive the harrowing trek back to safety without a horse, gun, or supplies.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E3 Jim Beckwourth: War Chief of the Crow When former slave Jim Beckwourth heads west to seek work as a trapper, he begins what will become one of the most eventful, heroic lives of all the mountain men. As a joke, one of Beckwourth's fellow trappers tells a group of Crow warriors that Beckwourth is a long-lost member of their tribe, and the adventure begins. Adopted by the Crow, Beckwourth joins them in a series of ferocious battles with other tribes, becomes a war chief, and falls in love with a fierce female warrior named Pine Leaf. He then uses his hard-won influence with the Crow to convince them to provide furs to the powerful American Fur Company. But an unexpected visit from legendary trapper and old friend Tom Fitzpatrick sets off a violent collision that forces Beckwourth to choose between the two worlds he loves.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E20 Matched Pair Jimmy reunites with Brad, an old friend and rival from his youth. They soon discover that Clara, the daughter of a man who was their mentor, is missing. In actuality, she ran away after finding out about her father's corruption.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Rebellion Cheyenne travels to Mexico to deliver freight. He soon becomes entangled in a murder plot, and the brutal leader of the French troops forces Cheyenne to stand against him. Mexican rebels, including an old foe, rescue him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E2 Trial by Conscience Newly deputized, Cheyenne brings law and order to a small town after the murder of its sheriff. Once there, he uses an old stage trick from the play "Hamlet" to bring a corrupt businessman to justice for murder.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it’s an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody’s brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other’s workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba’s ranch chores. Misty wants to be a stay-at-home mom, but suffers an accident while trying to help Cody on the farm. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E2 Trial by Conscience Newly deputized, Cheyenne brings law and order to a small town after the murder of its sheriff. Once there, he uses an old stage trick from the play "Hamlet" to bring a corrupt businessman to justice for murder.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: S3 E14 Best of the West Host Jill Wagner travels the country to find artisans who make handcrafted products that celebrate the Western way of life. In Arizona, we meet a custom hat maker who made his first hat at 12. In Texas, there's a shop teacher turned quality spur maker, and a leather worker with talent beyond his years. In Colorado, a team of belt buckle makers craft Western themed buckles. In California, a Frenchman named Pedro crafts leather saddles and a young boot maker is inspired by the style of the 1950s. And in Tennessee, a legendary father/ son team make unique leather chinks.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E5 Kit Carson: The Greatest Scout in the West As a fur trapper, hunter, scout, and explorer, Kit Carson is an irresistible subject for reporters and novelists, and his incredible adventures make him a mythic figure in his own lifetime. Yet fame is the last thing on Carson's mind in 1849. All he wants to do is settle down to a quiet life with his wife on the family ranch, but once again fate comes calling. When settler Ann White is captured by an Apache raiding party, the Army seeks out Carson to help track the warriors and rescue Mrs. White, whose husband was killed in the raid. Although known to be the best tracker in the history of the Western Frontier, Carson admits this is the most difficult trail he has ever followed. He leads the military on a desperate chase, tracking the Apache through 200 miles of treacherous western wilderness. When they finally catch up with the Apache, the aftermath leaves Carson haunted for the rest of his days.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E21 Man Behind the Badge Van Dorn, a corrupt businessman and the man responsible for the murder of Marshal Sam Cain's wife, comes to Sweetwater. First, he ousts Cain and takes over the town, and then he appoints his gang to be the law enforcement for the town.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: Nazis on the Run
programme.desc: The Hunt The Nuremberg Trials continue; Robert H Jackson, makes convincing statements that leave a lasting impression on the court; questions about the final solution and each Nazi's involvement leave an uncomfortable atmosphere in the court room.

programme.title: Nazis on the Run
programme.desc: The Verdict The Nuremberg Trials are coming to an end; the Nazi officials on trial hope they will be given a lesser sentence for providing new information; some still believe they are above the justice system.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Festus thinks that his cousins are responsible for the death of a man, and pursues them out of town.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: As Slim escorts young Virg Walker back to Laramie, it is discovered that Virg is using money from a stage coach robbery and murder.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne, Smitty and a band of desperados are trapped in a mountain fortress.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A gunman's unpredictable behavior leads Matt to try to find out who hired him.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester swears that the stranger in town is there to kill him, but Matt is skeptical.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Harry Speener kills a fugitive who once saved his life, but finds his decision unpopular in Dodge.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester and Doc worry about Kitty's new friendship with outlaw Cole Yankton.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: An Army sergeant (Forrest Tucker) is accused of desertion and the theft of an Army payroll.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newly gets himself in legal trouble when he releases a dangerous outlaw (Steve Ihnat) who wants to visit his daughter.

programme.title: How the West Was Won
programme.desc: "How the West Was Won" is the story of rugged mountain man Zeb Macahan (played by a post-"Gunsmoke" James Arness), who is forced to care for his brother's four children after the outbreak of the Civil War interrupts the family's planned trek west. The children's widowed Aunt Molly travels from Boston to help Zeb care for his brood, which consists of eldest son Luke, a fugitive from justice after killing a man in self defense; sisters Laura and Jessie, and youngest son Josh. Location filming in Arizona, Colorado, Utah and Southern California give the production a distinctive look.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, a reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the outlaw; it will be seen if the reporter can stay objective or takes matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all; years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: When his wagon falls down a cliff, Davey Baxter's mother is killed, and his arm is crushed; the doctor is unavailable, so Chris Hale is the one forced to make the decision to amputate Davey's to save his life.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: The new stage line superintendent wants Jess fired, which causes tension on the ranch; Slim and Jess track horse thieves.

programme.title: Campmeeting
programme.desc: With Dr. Mike Murdock.

programme.title: Campmeeting
programme.desc: With Dr. Mike Murdock.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt's friend becomes a murderer because of his fanatic opposition to the killing of a renegade wolf.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Two drifters (Dick Peobody, Walter Burke), one of whom is wanted for murder in Arizona, seek temporary work at the Ponderosa.

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: Nick's new fiancee joins the family on an annual camping trip in the mountains, but jealousy ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: While on the trail with a couple facing financial issues, Jess and the couple find a mule loaded with sacks of gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne battles a town to learn the reason why a war hero's body is refused burial within the town boundary.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Three robbers force Lucas to help them rob the North Fork bank.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A matriarch seeks revenge for her sons' deaths.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: The foreman threatens to quit when he and John disagree over a drifter John hired for a cattle drive.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Revenge is the primary mission for two people (Carolyn Jones and Fabian) who escape from Indian captivity. Barbara Stanwyck also guest stars.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: Hardie puts trust in newly released outlaw Bill Dowd, but will he regret it?

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A would-be bounty hunter has hidden motives, and Matt gets caught in his plan.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: Injured on the trail, Jess is found by an old friend who has been rustling cattle in the area, and finds himself mistaken for one of the rustlers.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne and Smitty agree to lead a wagon train.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt tries to investigate a murder, but uncovers a violent bank-robbery plan instead.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A young man's determination to avenge the death of his father leads him to Dodge City.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Mavis McCloud, a naive Eastern girl, falls prey to frontier violence.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A drifter, saved from lynching at the hands of two ranchers, faces another hangman's noose when he carries out a plan of revenge.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A middle-aged sea captain (Richard Basehart) gives up the nautical life and decides to settle in Dodge City.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Festus, lost and wandering in the desert, stumbles into a ghost town and finds himself attacked by an unknown assailant.

programme.title: How the West Was Won
programme.desc: Luke is shot trying to keep residents of an Indian village from being massacred.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice, because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: A sergeant becomes torn between his Cherokee roots and his loyalty to the U.S. Army when he faces a 20-year prison sentence.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: A man interrupts a murder and robbery, and makes the most out of his moment of celebrity at Slim's expense.

programme.desc: A farmer (Harry Morgan) orders his three sons to go to town and not come back without prospective brides.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The family tries to identify a girl, found clinging to a rag doll near the bodies of her murdered parents.

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: The valley residents turn to the Barkleys when the railroad threatens their farms and ranches.

programme.title: Laramie

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne finds that an infant boy is the only survivor of a stagecoach robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark McCain settle near North Fork.

programme.desc: A sprightly elderly lady arrives in North Fork and announces that she plans to capture a bandit.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: When three robbers meet up with the wagon train, a woman is kidnapped and her husband is badly beaten.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: While crossing a sprawling ranch, trouble brews between two newlyweds and an interloper.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester's Eastern pen pal is coming to Dodge to marry him, but he has deceived her.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt steps in to fight a professional boxer to save a former prizefighter's life.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: Five years after committing murder, Frank Buckley is paroled to Slim Sherman, but there are some in town who don't want the killer in their midst.

programme.title: Cheyenne

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester is infatuated with a pretty runaway with a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A naive girl from the East becomes the victim of brutal violence in Dodge City.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt has trouble finding home for an orphan girl whose father died in a fire.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A prospector regrets boasting about his strike when the situation turns violent.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Festus' cousin Mayblossom arrives from Texas to fulfill a pact from childhood and marry him.

programme.title: How the West Was Won
programme.desc: A religious sect cares for wounded Luke while he avoids a bounty hunter; a gunfighter courts Kate.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal; former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer; the unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's criminal career once and for all.

programme.title: Wagon Train

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E26 Assault Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E27 Short Rope for a Tall Man Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E28 The Clarence Bibs Story Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Friend Zone A shipment from Faith Cattle Company is in jeopardy when the truck gets stuck in a ditch. It’s a race against the clock to get the cattle to the buyer or risk losing the deal. Bubba teams up with his father-in-law to build a custom grill prototype in hopes of launching a new business venture. Cody decides to sell a horse to help fund his dream home, but he receives an offer that is less than ideal. After getting relationship advice from Bubba and Cody, Booger ends up on a date with his best friend Ashley.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E5 Is It a Boy or a Girl? Before heading out for the day’s work, Bubba notices one of his colts is missing, and the guys go searching for the young horse before it is injured. At the urging of his grandmother, Booger ventures into the world of Internet dating, hoping to find a serious girlfriend. After Bubba’s trusted horse gets sick, he asks Booger to help him break in a new colt. Cody and Misty finally find out if they are having a little cowboy or cowgirl, and they plan a party to reveal the gender to friends and family.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E27 Short Rope for a Tall Man Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E28 The Clarence Bibs Story Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E6 Misty Makes a Match The cowboys are in for a busy week when they’re called upon to capture a wild hog that has been getting into a neighbor’s garden. They also search a swamp for a calf that goes missing when they move their herd. Cody and Misty get serious about finding a name for their baby boy, so they study their family trees for inspiration. After a disastrous attempt at Internet dating, Booger takes one more shot at dating and agrees to go on a blind date that Misty arranges. Will he finally find a woman that understands the cowboy way of life?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E7 Frost Moves In Bubba and Cody rush to get their grass planted before the first frost, but they need a bigger tractor to get the job done. Bubba ends up building a horse stall for a neighbor in exchange for the use of his tractor. Booger’s relationship with Jaclyn gets serious, and he meets her son for the first time. Cody and Booger rescue a cow from a huge dirt pit, and Cody receives a load of dirt for the foundation of his dream home. Finally, Kaley surprises Bubba with the news that their baby girl is going to arrive sooner than expected.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E2 Grit, Guts and Danger The 13 remaining cowboys compete in individual and team challenges to prove their skills to host Trace Adkins and his expert judges, but the competition turns perilous when one cowboy disappears while herding horses in the unforgiving Arizona desert.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E4 Lewis & Clark: Captains of Discovery Under orders from President Jefferson to explore America's vast unknown frontier, Meriwether Lewis and William Clark lead an expedition up the Missouri River in an attempt to reach the Pacific Ocean...a journey no American has made before, and one that may not even be possible. Leaving Fort Mandan after their first winter on the frontier, the Corps of Discovery enters completely uncharted territory. But as the waterways they travel become too shallow for boats, Lewis and Clark desperately seek the Shoshone tribe and their horses. To communicate with the elusive tribe, they rely on Sacagawea, a 16-year-old Shoshone woman, who accompanies the expedition with her newborn son. Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E18 Daddy's Girl There is a new girl in Sweetwater, and she has eyes for Buck. However, Buck must contend with her rich, oppressive father. Meanwhile, the riders help a woman in need after the corrupt banker's henchmen kill her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E30 The Mescalero Curse Lucas serves as a jury foreman when a Mescalero Apache Indian is found guilty of murder and is hanged. A Mescalero medicine man places a curse on Lucas. At first Lucas brushes it off, then unusual events begin to happen including a ghost stallion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: Savannah Sunrise
programme.desc: Joy Miles thinks she's taking a simple road trip to move her mother-in-law, Loraine, from Louisville to Savannah. Complete opposites, the two women manage to tolerate each other - barely. Type A+ personality, Joy is consumed with a high-stakes project at work. She has her days scheduled to the second. Now widowed, free-spirited Loraine is moving to a retirement community, no longer a preacher's wife, but a woman on her own. Her insights about life and family get under Joy's skin, challenging Joy to take a hard look at her whirlwind career and her priorities. As the weekend unfolds, with its outrageous adventures, hilarious encounters and heart-to-heart revelations, the women come to see each other through new eyes, and both women make an astounding discovery: they need each other more than they know.

programme.desc: S1 E6 Misty Makes a Match The cowboys are in for a busy week when they’re called upon to capture a wild hog that has been getting into a neighbor’s garden. programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

Complete opposites, the two women manage to tolerate each other - barely. Type A+ personality, Joy is consumed with a high-stakes project at work. She has her days scheduled to the second. Her insights about life and family get under Joy's skin, challenging Joy to take a hard look at her whirlwind career and her priorities. As the weekend unfolds, with its outrageous adventures, hilarious encounters and heart-to-heart revelations, the women come to see each other through new eyes, and both women make an astounding discovery: they need each other more than they know.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E8 An Extra Hand Cody, Bubba, and Booger audition a bunch of local cowboys and non-cowboys to find a ranch hand that can help out when Bubba takes time off to be with his new baby. Bubba and Kaley risk one last trip to Mississippi for a baby shower. Kaley wants to see her family, but they worry that the baby will come early and be born outside of Alabama. After meeting with his banker, Booger is forced to sell off his family’s land, but he desperately hopes to find a buyer willing to let him keep a small portion with his grandmother’s house.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E9 New Beginnings Bubba and Kaley welcome their baby girl into the world. When they get home from the hospital, Kaley surprises Bubba with a special gift. Cody lands a big contracting job with a local rancher, but the work needs to be completed in a week. He needs this job to fund the construction of his dream home, so he must get the work done somehow. Booger is beginning to think that Jaclyn might be “the one,” so he decides to introduce her to his grandma. Finally, the whole gang gets together for a Faith Cattle family barbecue to meet baby Andie.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sabotage and Soul Searching Given a choice to help or sabotage their fellow contestants, the thirteen remaining cowboys are forced to question their values and the lengths they'll go to win a $50,000 herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges eliminate two cowboys.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E8 Jedediah Smith: Scholar and Survivor A young Jedediah Smith joins William Ashley's expedition and helps establish the fur trade along the Missouri River, but it's not hunting or trapping he longs for...it's adventure. Inspired by Lewis and Clark, he wants to explore the vast, uncharted American frontier. Trekking through unknown and unforgiving terrain, Smith's iron will and unwavering courage under fire help him survive a vicious grizzly bear attack, hostile Native Americans, and life-or-death periods of starvation, dehydration, and exhaustion. During his incredible journeys, he becomes the first non-Native American to cross the Mojave Desert into California, the first to navigate through the perilous Sierra Nevada Mountains, and the first to traverse the Great Basin Desert. He ultimately sees more of the American West than any other adventurer, including Lewis and Clark, and opens the frontier in a way that no other mountain man can claim.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E19 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Vaqueros Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 Blind Spot Cheyenne rides into a small cotton town to pick up a friend's son to try to reunite a family bitterly divided by the Civil War. He soon battles hatred and greed by a vigilante gang that is holding the town captive.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E1 Reprieve Sheriff Pinkerton deputizes Cheyenne, and he transports crook Wes McQueen to a hidden fortune. When someone shoots and kills McQueen, Cheyenne impersonates him in order to find the bounty.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E8 An Extra Hand Cody, Bubba, and Booger audition a bunch of local cowboys and non-cowboys to find a ranch hand that can help out when Bubba takes time off to be with his new baby. programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E1 Reprieve Sheriff Pinkerton deputizes Cheyenne, and he transports crook Wes McQueen to a hidden fortune. When someone shoots and kills McQueen, Cheyenne impersonates him in order to find the bounty.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it’s an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody’s brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other’s workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba’s ranch chores. Misty wants to be a stay-at-home mom, but suffers an accident while trying to help Cody on the farm. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E4 Cowboy Up Cowboys need brawn and brains, so the remaining 11 contestants are tested on both. First, they guess the cost of common ranch items; then they endure a grueling overnight challenge guarding a herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins eliminates two cowboys.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Trapper, Trader, Legend Although from humble beginnings, Tom Fitzpatrick is ambitious and intelligent. When he joins up with William Ashley's trapping expedition, he proves himself to be an invaluable member of the company, both as a hardy frontiersman and a shrewd businessman. Along with legendary mountain man Jedediah Smith, Fitzpatrick rediscovers the South Pass through the Rocky Mountains, opening the pathway that will enable western expansion for decades to come. Fitzpatrick quickly rises to the top of the fur trade and eventually takes over the company he once worked for, but he nearly loses everything when he takes a wrong turn while leading a supply train. Alone in the wilderness, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a band of Gros Ventre warriors. Somehow, Fitzpatrick must survive the harrowing trek back to safety without a horse, gun, or supplies.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E3 Jim Beckwourth: War Chief of the Crow When former slave Jim Beckwourth heads west to seek work as a trapper, he begins what will become one of the most eventful, heroic lives of all the mountain men. As a joke, one of Beckwourth's fellow trappers tells a group of Crow warriors that Beckwourth is a long-lost member of their tribe, and the adventure begins. Adopted by the Crow, Beckwourth joins them in a series of ferocious battles with other tribes, becomes a war chief, and falls in love with a fierce female warrior named Pine Leaf. He then uses his hard-won influence with the Crow to convince them to provide furs to the powerful American Fur Company. But an unexpected visit from legendary trapper and old friend Tom Fitzpatrick sets off a violent collision that forces Beckwourth to choose between the two worlds he loves.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E20 Matched Pair Jimmy reunites with Brad, an old friend and rival from his youth. They soon discover that Clara, the daughter of a man who was their mentor, is missing. In actuality, she ran away after finding out about her father's corruption.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Rebellion Cheyenne travels to Mexico to deliver freight. He soon becomes entangled in a murder plot, and the brutal leader of the French troops forces Cheyenne to stand against him. Mexican rebels, including an old foe, rescue him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E2 Trial by Conscience Newly deputized, Cheyenne brings law and order to a small town after the murder of its sheriff. Once there, he uses an old stage trick from the play "Hamlet" to bring a corrupt businessman to justice for murder.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it’s an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody’s brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other’s workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba’s ranch chores. Misty wants to be a stay-at-home mom, but suffers an accident while trying to help Cody on the farm. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E4 Cowboy Up Cowboys need brawn and brains, so the remaining 11 contestants are tested on both. First, they guess the cost of common ranch items; then they endure a grueling overnight challenge guarding a herd of cattle. Host Trace Adkins eliminates two cowboys.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Trapper, Trader, Legend Although from humble beginnings, Tom Fitzpatrick is ambitious and intelligent. When he joins up with William Ashley's trapping expedition, he proves himself to be an invaluable member of the company, both as a hardy frontiersman and a shrewd businessman. Along with legendary mountain man Jedediah Smith, Fitzpatrick rediscovers the South Pass through the Rocky Mountains, opening the pathway that will enable western expansion for decades to come. Fitzpatrick quickly rises to the top of the fur trade and eventually takes over the company he once worked for, but he nearly loses everything when he takes a wrong turn while leading a supply train. Alone in the wilderness, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a band of Gros Ventre warriors. Somehow, Fitzpatrick must survive the harrowing trek back to safety without a horse, gun, or supplies.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E3 Jim Beckwourth: War Chief of the Crow When former slave Jim Beckwourth heads west to seek work as a trapper, he begins what will become one of the most eventful, heroic lives of all the mountain men. As a joke, one of Beckwourth's fellow trappers tells a group of Crow warriors that Beckwourth is a long-lost member of their tribe, and the adventure begins. Adopted by the Crow, Beckwourth joins them in a series of ferocious battles with other tribes, becomes a war chief, and falls in love with a fierce female warrior named Pine Leaf. He then uses his hard-won influence with the Crow to convince them to provide furs to the powerful American Fur Company. But an unexpected visit from legendary trapper and old friend Tom Fitzpatrick sets off a violent collision that forces Beckwourth to choose between the two worlds he loves.
